name: Halloween clicker game tycoon the deluxe ultra version free game
name_original: Halloween clicker game tycoon the deluxe ultra version free game
description:
Click monsters to get candy

Buy upgrades with the candy

And get stronger and stronger!

Over an hour of clicking ( so make sure to take breaks if your hand is tired )

Right click when enemies are red, and middle click when enemies are blue

( auto clickers could lag the game )
